title: A Huge, Floating Screen Will Sift Plastic out of the Ocean
body: A 100-meter floating barrier will be tested in the North Sea in an attempt to catch and remove plastic pollution from the world's oceans. A nonprofit foundation based in the Netherlands has ...
readable_content: - Guest (2023-12-08): I found an interesting article on scientificamerican.com. It's about a prototype for a floating barrier that will gather plastic bits from the ocean. The aim is to test the prototype in the North Sea and, if successful, deploy a full-scale version in the Pacific Ocean in 2020. This seems like a great initiative to combat plastic pollution.
